## Agent Review
<!-- Which agent roles should review this? -->

- [ ] **CTO** - Technical architecture, quality, testing
- [ ] **CPO** - Product alignment, user value
- [ ] **CISO** - Security implications
- [ ] **CMO** - Documentation, messaging
- [ ] **COO** - Process adherence, wrap-up requirements
- [ ] **CEO** - Cross-functional impact, strategic alignment

## Pre-Merge Checklist
<!-- Verify before merging -->

- [ ] Activity log updated with this PR
- [ ] Changelog updated (if user-facing)
- [ ] All tests passing
- [ ] Branch follows naming convention (`feat/`, `fix/`, `docs/`, `chore/`)
- [ ] Commit messages follow conventional format
- [ ] No secrets or sensitive data in commits
- [ ] Co-author attribution added: `Co-Authored-By: Warp <agent@warp.dev>` (if AI-assisted)

## Additional Context
<!-- Anything else reviewers should know? -->


---

**Review Guidelines:**
- PRs with product scope need CPO approval
- Technical/infra changes need CTO approval (+ CISO for security)
- Breaking changes need CEO approval
- Messaging/marketing changes need CMO approval
